name: Chest
description: The muscles in the chest region, including the pectoralis major and pectoralis minor.

name: Back
description: The muscles in the back, including the latissimus dorsi, rhomboids, and trapezius.

name: Upper Legs
description: The muscles in the lower body, including quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Lower Legs
description: The muscles in the lower body, including calves & ankles.

name: Shoulders
description: The muscles in the shoulder region, including deltoids and trapezius.

name: Upper Arms
description: The muscles in the arms, including biceps and triceps.

name: Forearms
description: The muscles in the lower arms, including the brachioradialis, flexor and extensor muscles of the wrist and fingers.

name: Core
description: The muscles in the abdominal and lower back region, including the rectus abdominis and obliques.

name: Neck
description: The muscles in the neck region, including the sternocleidomastoid, scalenes, and other associated muscles.

name: Cardiovascular
description: The cardiovascular system, involving the heart and lungs. Cardio exercises benefit the overall cardiovascular system.
